Control Name: Information Access Management  Isolating Healthcare Clearinghouse Functions - 164.308(a)(4)(ii)(A)
Control Statement: If a health care clearinghouse is part of a larger organization, the clearinghouse must implement policies and procedures that protect the electronic protected health information of the clearinghouse from unauthorized access by the larger organization.
